title: The War on Words - Getting There & Work in Progress
itunes:title: The War on Words - Getting There & Work in Progress
itunes:subtitle: You need to really connect with your present instead of buying yourself off with some promise of "the future you." So, on this minisode, Gary's going to war with the expressions "Getting There" and "Work in Progress."
description:
Gary's back to show you how you're getting trapped in your own language with another installment of The War on Words. This time, Gary's taking up arms against the phrases "Getting There" and "Work in Progress," to show you that you need to really connect with your present instead of buying yourself off with some promise of "the future you." So light your torch and grab your pitchfork, it's time for War!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfuck Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfuck Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
